from.sql: select id, uid, category, rate_count, rate,comment, is_private, uploadtime from images

to.sql: select u.`id` as id, u.`nickname` as nickname, u.`gender` as gender, u.`membership` as membership, u.`status` as status, u.`last_login` as last_login, u.`signup_date` as signup_date, ug.`country_iso` as country_iso, ug.`city`, ug.`lat` as lat, ug.`lon` as lon from users_account u left join users_geo ug on u.id = ug.id
